ai-tika-abh02t23:227_6: They split the teaching, the text, and the terminology, and much reason why they used to create a schism in the teaching. When they have arisen, they give it up that ignorance, and the way their mind incline to remaining more than that.’
ai-tika-abh02t23:228_0: The Book of the skillful roots is finished.
ai-tika-abh02t23:230_0: The Analysis of dependent originations is finished.
